channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Schneider Electric InduSoft Web Studio and InTouch Machine Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Schneider Electric InduSoft Web Studio and InTouch Machine Edition

item.title: CVE-2018-8840|2024-08-05T07:02:26.247Z -- ics-cert -- schneider%20electric%20indusoft%20web%20studio%20and%20intouch%20machine%20edition
item.description: A remote attacker could send a carefully crafted packet in InduSoft Web Studio v8.1 and prior versions, and/or InTouch Machine Edition 2017 v8.1 and prior versions during a tag, alarm, or event related action such as read and write, which may allow remote code execution.
